textList.text: You arrive at the Lizard sector. While the Lizards don't have the numbers to engage in Galactic war after their home system was destroyed by a supernova, few races can match Lizards' resilience and optimism.

After almost all of the Lizard species were wiped out by a supernova, their biggest colony became their last refuge. The Lizards are still optimistic about their future and wish to reclaim their former glory.
Days of Lizards' glory are long gone, after their home was devastated by a supernova. The Lizards are doing their best to rebuild and repopulate the galaxy, but the Rebellion thwarted their plans.
A battered station owned by an old Lizard trader is still operational at this beacon and offers some supplies and equipment.
You meet a trading fleet belonging to Lizards. Most of them are offering consumer goods, but you manage to find one with military supplies, too.
An automated station is offering some supplies in exchange for scrap. The Lizards owning it are long gone, and you wonder who's going to collect the profits.
